meanings.sent1: The computer processed the data in small octets.
meanings.sent2: The network transmitted information in octets.
meanings.sent3: The octets of data danced across the screen.
meanings.sent4: In the digital world, octets are the building blocks of information.
meanings.sent5: Counting in octets makes understanding binary code easier.

meanings.definition: A set of eight musical notes.
meanings.sent1: The melody was composed of beautiful octets.
meanings.sent2: The musician played a series of octets on the piano.
meanings.sent3: The octets of music harmonized perfectly together.
meanings.sent4: Her voice soared through the octets of the song.
meanings.sent5: Learning to read octets of music is like solving a puzzle.

meanings.definition: A group of eight people or things.
meanings.sent1: The octets of friends gathered for a picnic.
meanings.sent2: The team consisted of octets of skilled players.
meanings.sent3: The octets of cupcakes disappeared quickly at the party.
meanings.sent4: In the octets of stars, she found her true friends.
meanings.sent5: The octets of flowers in the garden bloomed beautifully in spring.
